title: Bloomberg Markets: Between a Stock and a Hard Place
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Between a Stock and a Hard Place
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Michael Sobel Co-Founder/Managing Director Scenic Advisement Discussing what the market needs to know about the impact of mutual fund pricing.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
